text: @morningmika @CJ_Soldier05 @realDonaldTrump So one person out of thousands who was at the rally got Covid-19 so you assume he got it at the rally.  He could have been infected anywhere.  The president didn't need to squash people in. As always there were too many people who wanted to be in. Your post is bullsh!t
